value.title: AWS Named United Airlines' Preferred Cloud Provider

value.title: How Artificial Intelligence And Machine Learning Are Transforming The Future Of Renewable Energy
value.excerpt: All of these resources are tied up with the weather, which is something humans can’t control. Artificial intelligence has helped in overcoming this challenge because it is a reliable tool for forecasting the weather.

value.title: How do we develop AI education in schools? A panel discussion
value.excerpt: AI is a broad and rapidly developing field of technology. Our goal is to make sure all young people have the skills, knowledge, and confidence to use and create AI systems. So what should AI

value.title: Why Employers Should Ditch Relying On AI As A Recruitment Tool
value.excerpt: As has been written here and elsewhere, one of the great mysteries of the current economic environment is how businesses of all sorts can be complaining of staff shortages at the same time as even the best qualified young people struggle to get on to the employment ladder.

value.title: Spy chief's warning: Our foes are now 'pouring money' into quantum computing and AI
value.excerpt: In a rare public speech, MI6 chief warns that hostile states focused on quantum and AI. The rise of technologies like artificial intelligence (AI) and quantum computing is changing the world – and intelligence services must adapt in order to operate in an increasingly digital environment,

value.title: Actions Taken For Ethical AI In 2021
value.excerpt: Countries are investing heavily in AI research and development. However, there are currently no norms or standards in place for ethical AI research, design, or use.

value.title: Sophos Intercept X Advanced review: AI-powered protection
value.excerpt: These days AI seems to be everywhere, and Sophos Intercept X proudly exploits it to help identify unknown malware. It also blocks ransomware attacks using behavioral analysis, and provides tools to investigate potential threats to see how and why they occurred.

value.title: An AI Finds Superbug-Killing Potential in Human Proteins
value.excerpt: A team scoured the human proteome for antimicrobial molecules and found thousands, plus a surprise about how animals evolved to fight infections.

value.title: Portugal’s ‘Predictive maintenance’ startup Stratio pulls in a $12M Series A round led by Forestay
value.excerpt: The fleet management industry needs to be able to predict when a truck or a van is about to break down. Not only does this prevent millions in lost revenues, it also has huge implications for supply chains.

value.title: Samsung brings three automotive chips for 5G, infotainment. Read details
value.excerpt: Samsung has introduced three of its latest automotive chip solutions; the Exynos Auto T5123 for 5G connectivity, the Exynos Auto V7 for in-vehicle infotainment systems and the ASIL-B certified S2VPS01 power management IC (PMIC) for the Auto V series.

value.title: US Robot Manufacturer To Pay 1.5 Crore To Claim Rights For 'kind And Friendly' Human Face
value.excerpt: A tech company named Promobot is seeking a face for its next humanoid robot. The face of the person will be used for appearance of robots in places like malls.

value.title: Eftpos expands security kit bag with new AI anti-fraud capability
value.excerpt: Eftpos has switched on a new AI anti-fraud online capability as the Australian debit payments provider continues to expand its security features. The new capability is underpinned by a fraud detection engine that uses AI and machine learning to predict individual behaviour in real time.

value.title: Face-Off: Robots Come Equipped With Facial Recognition
value.excerpt: In the not-so-distant future, robotic dogs equipped with facial recognition cameras might just scamper about outside and help police officers identify suspicious persons. Contactless commerce, airport security and law enforcement: The use of facial recognition technology (FRT) is quickly becoming a must-have for the public and private sectors.

value.title: Botto, the decentralized AI/human artist, makes its first million
value.excerpt: An AI algorithm called Botto has made somewhere around US$1.3 million at auction for its first six NFT artworks. Botto generates thousands of images, and a community of humans vote to influence its direction and decide which pieces go to auction.

value.title: Hyderabad: GITAM to host FDP on AI in Cyber Security

value.title: Using AI To Scrub Image Noise (And Save Money And Time) In The Addams Family 2
value.excerpt: Removing visual noise from visual effects is a big challenge for post-production companies, but a new Intel de-noiser using artificial intelligence saved Cinesite an estimated 20 percent in creating the recently released 'The Addams Family 2' movie.

value.title: Beyond the migration: Accenture and AWS expand partnership to support continuous cloud innovation
value.excerpt: Five-year extension also includes training to help clients understand and implement cloud capabilities more quickly.

value.title: Robot company offers $200K for your face
value.excerpt: A robot manufacturing company is looking for a human face to put on its newest product. Promobot, a European company, said in a press release that it is willing to pay $200,000 to someone for the rights to use their face forever.

value.title: How Hiya taps AI to kill phone spam
value.excerpt: The company claims its new adaptive AI is much more effective than conventional tactics that only react to known numbers for phone spam.

value.title: Does the right to bear arms cover AI guns and killer robots?
value.excerpt: The conversation surrounding autonomous weapons may center on warfare and terrorism, but it's time we discussed the 2nd Amendment too.

value.title: How to remove bias from AI models
value.excerpt: With AI making more real-world decisions everyday, reining in bias is more important than ever. As AI becomes more pervasive, AI-based discrimination is getting the attention of policymakers and corporate leaders but keeping it out of AI-models in the first place is harder than it sounds.

value.title: Artificial intelligence that understands object relationships
value.excerpt: When humans look at a scene, they see objects and the relationships between them. On top of your desk, there might be a laptop that is sitting to the left of a phone, which is in front of a computer monitor.
